channel.title: Few Bugs that i Need help with

item.title: Few Bugs that i Need help with
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

Ok for first problem add the special attack to itemassistant.java and combatassistant.java.
There are alot of tuts for it on google.
But just add the case to the other cases.

For the second prob check which button it is which will show up in the run.cmd if you click it and change the correct prayer icon in clickingbutton.java i think but i am not sure

For the barrows prob try looking to the npc id of the barrows npc’s and just look around if there is something fucked up.

Fr the chaotic crossbow i shud add the bolts for it in combatassistant and/or itemassistant

This is all for pi btw

Read full topic
item.source: Few Bugs that i Need help with

item.title: Few Bugs that i Need help with
item.dc:creator: @owner_soul owner soul
item.description:
@owner_soul wrote:

Any help is highly appreciated!

Problem number one is that Granite maul special Doesn’t work.

case 29038: if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 13902) { c.specBarId = 7486; c.usingSpecial = !c.usingSpecial; c.getItems().updateSpecialBar(); } else { c.specBarId = 7486; /* * if (c.specAmount >= 5) { c.attackTimer = 0; * c.getCombat().attackPlayer(c.playerIndex); c.usingSpecial * = true; c.specAmount -= 5; } */ c.getCombat().handleGmaulPlayer(); c.getItems().updateSpecialBar(); } break;
[hr] Problem number two is that the prayers for some reason don't show up on top when you activate the melee protect, mage proetct, and range protect. here is an example. Sometimes they appear but get stuck on that one Protect and when you change the icon stays as range for example in the second picture.

lAka7.png765×501

and
PoSBI.png763×497

[hr]
problem three is that only admins can drop items for some reason. heres an example of a player and an admin.
PlRxD.gif764×496

[hr]
Problem number four is that the Chaotic Crossbow isn’t working with any bolts.

vvaU4.png764×500

[hr]
Last problem is that in barrows some special Weapons don’t work. heres an example of that.
It drains the special bar but it doesn’t perform the special attack. Example below

vN8k0.gif760×496

Read full topic
